mapper.notes:
Google Sheet Templates
Google Doc Templates
Google Slide Templates
Asana Templates
Client Project Drive Folders
Client Directory List
Guide to Asana Project Access
Link to IO: {{2.`13`}}

Task Process Checklist
(Production) Acknowledge receipt of the IO with the client, using the template below and updating where required. 

If @Andy Campbell is available, reassign the task to him for Asana and Drive setup. If @Andy Campbell is not available, the remainder of the process should be completed by Production or @Jane Gray.

IO Task Setup ([BsB] IO Submission Log)
Inside the IO Project (on this task)
Adjust the task title
If the full client name is missing or appears as other, please update it or add it to the task title.
Assign Client (Selecting from the DropDown List)
If the client does not exist, edit the options by scrolling to the bottom of the list.
Once in the edit menu, scroll down to the bottom of the list.
Add Client with code in []'s.
Sort it into alphabetical order.
Ensure the client appears in the list and assign it to this task.

Goal Setup (View goals)
Create a new goal
Blank Goal
Copy the IO Submission task title to the goal title.
Change the time period to FYxx (replace xx with the year, do not use H or Q separation).
Add Members (Teams):
Editorial
Production
Infrastructure
Sales
Directors
In the new goal, adjust progress settings
Change the setup to Projects
Change Reminder Cadence to Never
Save
Copy Goal Link (From top Arrow)
Add the goal link to the IO submission task.
From the IO Task, copy the Fields section goal description.
Delete the last Field (Goal Link).
Add a short list of Deliverables to the bottom of the goal description (copy from the IO document).
This can be a copy and paste from the IO document, or a simplified list if everything is as standard.

Set up IO Project(s) - Repeat for each project in the IO submission.
Open Asana Templates
Find the relevant template
Duplicate
Change project name
[ARR] dates/description [xxx001] [IO NUMBER]
Change the team to lead the team for that type of project.
Tick everything except task collaborators and greyed-out options.
Duplicate.
Open the new project (This may take a moment).
Copy the description from the Goal to the Project Overview
Add to the goal from the project overview
Connect to portfolios (Ensure adding to add ((All Open Client Projects)) alongside all other relevant ones)
Share the project with all relevant teams if not already done by the template:
Infrastructure & Project Leading Team should be "Project Admin"
Other invested teams should be assigned as "Editor".
All Science Squared Limited should be as "Commenter".
Remove the template sandbox team
A full guide is available here.
Return to list view
Assign the initial tasks
Perform initial tasks as required to complete the setup: 
Tasks to set up folders & files.
Set up tasks for WF support to set up additional links.
Set up initial contact tasks.
Repeat all of the above for each project required for the IO.

Mark the IO Submission Task Complete

Client Acknowledgement Email Template Email

Subject: Bitesize Bio [Project Type or "Projects"] [CLIENT CODE] [IO NUMBER]
To: [ALL LISTED CLIENT CONTACTS]
cc: production@bitesizebio.com, editorial-team@bitesizebio.com
bcc: customercare@bitesizebio.com & cc@pipelinedeals.com

Hello [NAME],

I hope you are well.

Thank you for your order with Bitesize Bio. We are looking forward to working with you on this.

To summarise, we will be delivering:
[LIST OF DELIVERABLES, SUMMARISED]
[LIST OF DELIVERABLES, SUMMARISED]
[LIST OF DELIVERABLES, SUMMARISED]
[LIST OF DELIVERABLES, SUMMARISED]

Your Bitesize Bio contacts will be: 

Production: @Production Team
Editorial: @Bitesize Bio Editorial Team

Our team will reach out shortly to begin booking your projects. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to let me know. 

Thank you again & kind regards,

[Sender Name]

notes.content:
we use Make's module to construct the JSON data, since it will automatically escape any breaking characters.

Currently, the assignee id is hard coded, once we have a database, we can assign a role to an individual and assign the correct ID based on that role.

Currently, the additional speakers, data contains carriage returns, which break the JSON. I have a variable in the preceeding step to this which should strip that out and reformat. Currently, not working. Will revisit once everything else is live
